title: Ticket #1606: change -subsystem to -daemon in tools
description:
Tools such as restart/on/off take a -subsystem argument to control entities found in the DAEMON_LIST. Instead, the argument should be -daemon. -subsystem should be an undocumented synonym for the time being.

It should also be made clear that the on -collector is shorthand for on -daemon collector, to avoid confusion when the collector appears as COLLECTORX in the DAEMON_LIST.

Resolution of this ticket involves both code and documentation changes.
